charges.charge_description: Activities re Material Constituting/Containing Child Porno (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft Pled Guilty to Count 1 of The Ind.; Dft Shall be Imprisoned For 180 Months; Upon Release From Imprisonment, Dft Shall be Placed on Supervised Release For 10 Years; Dft Shall Pay $100.00 to Crime Victim Fund (Special Assessment), to be Paid Immediately; no Fine Imposed; Dft Remanded.

charges.charge_description: Criminal Forfeiture in Violation of Exploitation of Minors (3)

charges.charge_disposition: Forfeiture Count Will be Entered as Part of The Courts Judgment And The Government is Directed to Provide The Appropriate Order.

charges.charge_description: Activities re Material Constituting/Containing Child Porno (2)
